description.value: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims. Whenever you Activate an Item to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} spell, you can invert its energy to produce the effects of an equivalent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} spell instead.

value.value: ability to cast heal and harm
